course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Fundamentals of Geotechnics
course.description: This course will focus on the geotechnical mechanics and associated soil behavior, including basic engineering geology, characteristics of soils, soil compaction, the principle of effective stress, shear strength of soils, the concept of critical state modeling, permeability, seepage problems, ground settlement and consolidation. The laboratory section consists of five different experiments. For CIVL and CIEV students under the four-year degree only.

reviews.author: timgor
reviews.comment_content: 呢科midterm前講soil ge特性同d parameters 點計, 之後輕輕講下soil compression, seepage(姐係water movement in soil). midterm ge重點就係total stress and effective stress同(un)drained (un)consolidation test 果part. Final就會詳解seepage同埋會用critical state model尼解釋下soil 唔同stress 同void ratio(~density)佢地之間ge關係咁. 最後會講少少settlement咁.
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof有心教 講得好清楚 最好睇埋佢canvas d teaching materials
有lecture video 容易follow+可以飛走晒D廢話 正
有大量body language 睇住佢對肥仔波都幾爽
口頭蟬係"basically", "OK, so..." 同埋"Dont leave early"
*小心 有個lab assistant 好19 成日西口西面 做錯少少成個lab就要重做 所以over run不是夢
reviews.comment_grading:
好grade midterm 30% final 40% asm 15% lab 15%
佢話如果final進步得夠多而你又係margin位, 咁佢就幫你up一個sub-grade 所以攻略係midterm考差D(好似係)
為左學生唔好因為midterm放棄 佢選擇放棄出midterm mean SD
利申 midterm 7X final平平around 85-90(估, 佢唔出final分的) asm~100 lab~90 最後A-
reviews.comment_workload: lab好煩 不過冇quiz HW佢有時比埋ans你炒 正

reviews.author: hihihiismeagain
reviews.title: Midterm大炒 都有B
reviews.comment_content:
midterm個時會考埋你d石 ge type 同點樣形成，有時間記住溫埋，不過我個年係MC考，唔洗死背
最重要都係教你typeI Type II soil drain 同undrain，
跟著要識畫TSP ESP
final個時都係最緊要識得畫6個case 的TSP同 ESP
同埋做熟hw同tutorial的題目
reviews.comment_teaching:
Professor好有heart
成日帶埋d石頭上堂
tutorial好有用如果係勁個個tutor上
落堂影低他的notes，節省好多溫書時間，lecture notes成百版，個tutor幾張紙就KO
reviews.comment_grading:
midterm個時大炒
i計錯 成題無分 成10幾20分無左
midterm同final好多人好高分 好多7/8/90分 mean應該好高
midterm我係差到我識的人入面最低分，得五十幾分，其實份卷唔難
做pastpaper同hw就會識
professor唔肯出mean，話唔想讀書甘competitive
professor話final進步得多會up一個sub-grade
final無出分，個個都話識得做，應該算易
midterm大炒最後有個B 其實算幾好grade
reviews.comment_workload:
Assignment*6
lab*5
d lab report TA好似好認真改
唔arm要求就扣分 e.g.無分版

reviews.author: 蒒丁格的內褲
reviews.title: 靚GRADE到你唔信
reviews.comment_content:
1. Basic engineering geology and rock mechanics (including soil formation and
clay minerals)
2. Characteristics of soils (including phase relationships, index properties of soils,
and soil classifications)
3. Soil compaction
4. Stresses and strains of soils
5. The principle of effective stress.
6. Shear strength of soils.
7. A critical state model to interpret soil behavior.
8. One-dimensional flow of water through soils (permeability).
9. Two-dimensional flow of water through soils (seepage).
10. One-dimensional consolidation settlement of fine-grained soils (consolidation).
reviews.comment_teaching:
個人認為幼行好用心教書
佢想每個人上堂都學到野, 所以上堂傾計會罵

允行上堂講野同用字都好優雅都好入腦
YEAR3既你上完佢堂一定成個腦都係佢個語調
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework 15%
Lab report 15%
midterm 30%
final 40%

homework fullmarks
lab nearly fullmarks
midterm 88.5%
我覺得MIDTERM好易, 雖然content好多,但係唔洗驚
PS 記得溫頭幾課, 考唔少
final unknown
final其實都唔難, 溫足書一定識做

我就A+左
6個FD分別係: A+ A A A B B+
下一個A+既相信係睇緊review既你

PS : ILOVE幼行
reviews.comment_workload:
hw有得抄不解釋

但3CRED既科咁樣太CHUR
從SEM頭做LAB做到SEM尾,仲要比人freeride
midterm同finial cover範圍都唔小野
加上2810個LAB, 2個星期交3份LAB REPORT
令到YR3 FALL變左最CHUR既SEM

小弟初遇freeride唔識檢舉
所以提醒所有見到呢個review既人,

記得檢舉freeride,杜絕害蟲!!!!

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 睇notes好複雜但考試唔難既岩土入門course
reviews.comment_content:
----------Midterm Exam start from here----------
Topic 1 Basic engineering geology and rock mechanics
Topic 2 Characteristics of soils
Topic 3 Soil compaction
Topic 4 Stresses and strains of soils
Topic 5 The principle of effective stress
Topic 6 Shear strength of soils (excluding in-situ test)
-----------Midterm Exam up to here-----------
-----------Final Exam start from here-----------
Topic 6 Shear strength of soils (in-situ test)
Topic 7 A critical state model to interpret soil behavior
Topic 8 One-dimensional flow of water through soils (permeability)
Topic 9 Two-dimensional flow of water through soils (seepage)
Topic 10 One-dimensional consolidation settlement of fine-grained soils (consolidation)
-----------Final Exam up to here-----------
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Wang 教得唔錯
會不斷重複重點
講明邊D野一定要識
講到明話會考返就一定會考
而且唔會rush去教書
會停一停問學生有無野問
雖然notes有少部分野比較rigorous
但個堆proof可以skip
只要聽佢講搵返重點就得
考試前有提供past paper做練習
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework: (15%)
HW1: 100/100  (Mean 98.57)
HW2: 99/100  (Mean 95.42)
HW3: 99/100  (Mean 96)
HW4: 100/100  (Mean 94.9)
HW5: 100/100  (Mean 93.4)
HW6: 100/100  (Mean 98.25)

Laboratory Report: (15%)
Lab1: 92/100
Lab2: 96/100
Lab3: 99/100
Lab4: 93/100
Lab5: 100/100 + 100/100

Midterm Exam: (Closed-book, 30%)
(No formulae given)
My Score: 87.75/103
(Mean 60.97, Highest 99.25)
(Median: 62.75, UQ: 76.75, LQ: 46.13)

Final Exam: (Closed-book, 40%)
(No formulae given)

Grade: A+

midterm無9成都有plus, 靚grade!!!
reviews.comment_workload:
Assignment workload算低
有6份 每份2-4題
Prof. Wang講到明全部都可以搵到答案
但要確保抄既同時要明白個原理
最尾3份佢直接比埋答案抄

Lab有5次 每次做完要分組寫Report
雖然比較煩 但係有兩個星期做
唯獨最後一次Lab要做兩份Report
而且有一份有好多data要處理
會比較chur 所以要盡早做
Overall黎講workload中等
無free rider + 有source問題不大

考試方面溫既workload都唔算大
Midterm會多少少野背, 尤其岩石種類
呢到有20分 唔可以miss
Final Exam唔會考返Midterm既野
所以無太多野背
基本上考試溫熟做熟HW同past paper題目就得
題型真係同佢所講既一樣 話出就會出

reviews.author: CIVIL GUYZ
reviews.title: The basis of geotechnical engineering
reviews.comment_content:
I Basic engineering geology
II characteristics of soils
III Soil compaction
IV Stress and strain in soil
V Effective and total stress**
VI Soil Shear Strength**
VII Critical State Model**
VIII 1-D model of water through soil
IX 2-D flow of water through soil
X 1-D consolidation settlement of fine-grained soils

For the topics in **, you will have to pay extra attention, as they will appear in the next course 3740, so you better understand thoroughly.
The course content covers the very important topics of soil mechanics, which is the basis for geotechnical engineering. If you want to develop your career in geotechnical field, getting concepts clear is a must. I suggest you read textbook 'craig's soil mechanics' as it is a great textbook with detailed explanations on concepts.
Don't be afraid of the loads of equations in the course notes, as the proofs will not be tested in the exams, but definitely it helps a lot to understand concepts.
I think that the course notes at first sight are not very well organized. But Professor will guide you through the notes and it turned out it's not that difficult.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Wang is a very passionate teacher. It is quite fun to go to his lessons. He is very experienced as he knows what students are weak at understanding, and he would explain the very important concepts for few times.

I didn't go to his classes, but I watched his lecture videos, and I found out that it is best to watch his lectures in 1.5x speed.

Overall he is a great teacher and everyone likes him.
reviews.comment_grading:
Lab reports, midterm, final.
Quite good grade. It is not difficult to understand the basic concepts. Before exams, try to do the assignments and past exam questions few times as there would be similar question type in the finals.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload for the lab reports were very heavy.
The assignments were not difficult, and they were just testing you whether you know the basic concepts. Assignments are very important as there will be questions similar in exams.

reviews.author: Watermelon
reviews.comment_content:
1. Basic engineering geology and rock mechanics (including soil formation and clay minerals)
2. Characteristics of soils (including phase relationships, index properties of soils, and soil classifications)
3. Soil compaction
4. Stresses and strains of soils  
5. The principle of effective stress.
6. Shear strength of soils (including field testing).
7. A critical state model to interpret soil behavior.
8. One-dimensional flow of water through soils (permeability).
9. Two-dimensional flow of water through soils (seepage).
10. One-dimensional consolidation settlement of fine-grained soils (consolidation).
reviews.comment_teaching:
教得都唔算差。

可以唔上堂，但最好睇recording，知道邊啲重要，考試會出。
reviews.comment_grading:
HW: 15%
Lab Report: 15%
Mid-term: 30%
Final exam: 40%
/
HW: ~98.1/100 (mean: ~95/100)
Lab report: 95+/100 (mean: 95+/100)
Mid-term: 73.5/100 (mean: 57.05/100)
Final exam: unknown

Overall: A
reviews.comment_workload:
功課: 6份，有充足時間，有source更好。
Lab: 5個Lab 計attendance，一定要上，唔係好多嘢。
Lab report: 每個lab都要做一份report，兩星期後上lab交。有source/同人做會更好。
Quiz: Canvas有quiz，不過冇做過，唔知有冇幫助，唔計分。

reviews.author: SQ Flyer
reviews.title: 重要科加好grade soil mechanics
reviews.comment_content:
内容基本上同往年無特別大分別 開頭都係
Basic Geology
Soil Classification
Compaction
呢D 基本Hard Facts 引入野 對Basic Geotechnical Engineering 有認識

之後就開始重點講不同Soil mechanics 課題
Stress Circle/ Stress Path
Effective Stress
Shear Strength of Soil- Mohr Coulomb Failure Criterion
(with different lab test e.g. shear box test, triaxial test under drained and undrained condition)

Critical State Model
1D Seepage
2D Seepage (flownet application)
1D Consolidation

呢個Course 學的内容非常重要去到 3740 或者其他Geotechnical course  會再繼續引申學 bearing capacity lateral earth pressure 同foundation design 之類 有D concept rock mechanics 都會接觸到 所以想係呢個field 發展呢個course 要讀得好D 出面見工基本上一定抽書問 裏面講到個堆Lab test 同Field Test 出面真係會用泥定design parameter
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof Wang 係台灣人 一個大肥佬教書睇得出好用心經驗好老到
雖然今個Sem上堂時間好爛 （三五 1330 Lunch Hour）得40人到會上Live 班 但係基本上lecture講書的速度普遍較慢同埋混合左好多extra内容（例如唔同Lab/ field test 或者industry practice） （題外話： Gary Li 呢條友上Live 成日問問題 成日搞到個個黑人問號 英文又難聽 會令你好激氣 最好睇片ignore 呢條友）

建議大家都係睇lecture video 開1.5倍速上堂揾返D重點内容跟住學會effective D Prof 主要都係跟住notes 教再加 annotation 講解 有時會有D 重要 example 講清楚邊D一定會考 一定要識學識點做  

基本上上堂都係圍繞concept多 同好多唔同test 去教你做Lab 同埋notes 有好多deviation 同proof 大概了解下就得
Notes 會有D長但係揾返重點concept 同assignment PP examples  一齊溫習其實就吾算好多

係midterm相對多D Geology soil classification 同compaction Hard Fact 要背下 建議同時讀埋4700 會記得相對輕鬆D
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading：
15% assignment * 6
15% lab *5
30% midterm (ch1-6)
40% final (ch7-10)

普遍Grading 幾好
Midterm 相對背書野多就炒車
但係Final 俾心機讀返好D概念 做熟題目全quantitative  Final 無出分直接出grade

最後都有A-
比起3310 算係回報較高
reviews.comment_workload:
workload 主要都係做Lab 同assignment 呢兩樣野基本上有sources 就唔會太難做 Assignment 基本上都係抽書 (Craig's soil mechanics & Budhu Soil Mechanics & Foundations from Wiley Publishing) 裏面的題目出尼做 所以想睇extra 例子或者學concept 透切D可以睇eBook 或者solution (讀3740 本書都會用得著)

Lab 基本上有兩個禮拜時間做 Lab Section 入去上0.5 hrs 之後同groupmate 打report就得 做落其實吾多
不過遇著賤格無能groupmate尤其Year 4 Retaker 要小心 最後個一兩份Lab 用最多時間做 儘早開始做最好 唔係就準備比無能Groupmate 激死

考試前溫返熟notes 概念加HW examples  PP 基本上問題唔大 畢竟考法算straight forward 學好個做法就問題不大

reviews.author: nming
reviews.title: 真係好靚grade
reviews.comment_content:
Midterm前教嘅野會好簡單 記住一定要背熟啲fact 佢MC同true or false會出好多detail位 自己midterm錯左好多就係因為冇咩背頭幾課 seepage同effective stress好重要 一定要明concept 因為之後final考嘅野係midterm嘅進階版 尤其是係呢兩個大topic
Final考嘅野難啲 都有好多圖要記 同埋多好多野係要理解有啲唔可以死背 但今年final出左條seepage係同功課一模一樣嘅題目 所以最好明晒所有功課啲題目 佢會有一兩條係難過其他題目 考你明唔明concept
reviews.comment_teaching:
好有心嘅Professor 但唔鍾意人地係佢上堂嗰時傾計 佢會請你出去 所以上佢堂千其唔好傾計 講書講得好慢所以好易跟

我自己上左頭兩三個禮拜就走晒堂 然後就睇lecture video 其實你有上晒堂或有睇翻晒啲lecture video就冇問題

真係跟唔到就去上埋tutorial 揾TA問問題 今個sem個TA講解得好好 但tutorial通常淨係用黎交assignment
reviews.comment_grading:
超靚grade

Assignment: ~100%
Midterm: 91%
Lab report:~90%
Final冇出 但應該唔差

Absolute grading 佢有講過話佢想全部派A range 但當然冇可能
我自己最後A+ 好好grade冇諗過有plus
身邊嗰個最少都有B
reviews.comment_workload:
好多野做

Assignment可以抄 佢會俾埋答案你抄 不過有時間嘅話自己做仲好 可以當埋温書

Lab report係呢個course最煩嘅野 5份lab report 有sources就輕鬆 但最後一份最難有啲人又撞正其他final 記住早啲開始做 有好嘅groupmate你呢部份就輕鬆好多

yr3嘅fall sem係chur啲 但念在呢個course咁好grade就最好努力啲讀

reviews.author: youknowwho123
reviews.title: Good CIVL course comparing with other civl course in the same semester ^^
reviews.comment_content:
As mentioned above la.
First part was taught by Prof. Wang. This part is some general knowledge and concepts about soil mechanics. It has been tested mainly in the midterm. Just memorize some important points (you will know what they are through past paper.)

Second part was taught by Prof CHOW. This part was mainly about calculations. Therefore, you better understand the concepts of those formulas to get a better grade.

Actually, profs will release past papers before midterm and final. They are kind profs, so the questions in real exam will be SIMILAR to those in past papers. Therefore, you should get yourself familiar with the past papers. Try to understand what is going on and I think your grade won't be too bad.
reviews.comment_teaching: Both profs were great. If you are interested, try to attend the lectures la. However, if you really don't have time, you can just skip it and do the past paper.
reviews.comment_grading:
HW 15%
Lab Report 15%
MT 30%
Final 40%

My result:
mt 79/100 mean: 57.1
final: unknown

Grade: A+
reviews.comment_workload:
6 Homework, but you can search for ans online, and some of them were just practices, no need to hand in.
5 lab reports. They are indeed troublesome, especially for last 2 reports. It takes much more time to finish it. Btw, be careful of freeriders. If your group got a freerider or trash teammate, good luck :).
Therefore, I think the workload is ok. It would not be so chur.

reviews.author: engineIsGood
reviews.comment_content:
Ch1: Basic engineering geology and rock mechanics (including soil formation and
clay minerals)
Ch2: Characteristics of soils (including phase relationships, index properties of soils
and soil classifications)
Ch3: Soil compaction
Ch4: Stresses and strains of soils
Ch5: The principle of effective stress
Ch6: Shear strength of soils (including field testing)
Ch7: A critical state model to interpret soil behavior
Ch8: One-dimensional flow of water through soils (permeability)
Ch9: Two-dimensional flow of water through soils (seepage)
Ch10: One-dimensional consolidation settlement of fine-grained soils (consolidation)

There are a lot of things to remember in Ch1. I think Ch6 and Ch7 are the most challenging chapters. Other topics should be manageable.

There are 6 hw, 5 lab and lab report, 1 mid-term and 1 final. We took the mid-term at night instead of lecture time.
reviews.comment_teaching:
He knows that the content is difficult and he tries his best to teach. He always repeats important concepts.

He told us that learning is a metal game. If you think that the content is very difficult and you can't understand, you can never understand. If you think you can handle them, you can finally handle the difficult content.
reviews.comment_grading:
Normal grading.

He did not release the mean and SD for mid-term and final exam as he didn't want learning to be so competitive.
reviews.comment_workload:
Heavy workload.

The lab report contributes half of the workload even if your group does not have any free-riders or deadline-fighter, especially for the last lab.

reviews.author: Jck2
reviews.title: Don't be frightened by the content
reviews.comment_content:
-- Taught by Prof. Wang  
Topic 1 Basic Engineering Geology & Rock Mechanics
Topic 2 Characteristics of Soils
Topic 3 Soil Compaction

-- Taught by Prof. Chow --
Topic 4 Stress & Strains in Soil
Topic 5 Total Stress and Effective Stress
Topic 6 Shear Strength of Soils
Topic 7 A Critical State Model to Interpret Soil Behavior
Topic 8 One-dimensional Flow of Water Through Soils (Permeability of soils)
Topic 9 2D Flow of Water Through Soils
Topic 10 1D Consolidation Settlement of Fine-Grained Soils

Midterm: Topics 1-6
Final exam: Topics 6-10

For topics 1-3, spend some time memorizing facts and definitions from topic 1 as it accounts quite a portion of the midterm. Pay extra attention to phase relationship from topic 2 as it will be used throughout the course, get yourself familiarized with it.
Topics 4-6 are the fundamentals of topics 7-10 so make sure you know them very well. Once you are clear with the concepts you will be fine.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Wang is passionate in teaching but his accent may not be acceptable to everybody. You can tell he is trying really hard to deliver something to you but sometimes you just can't understand. His part is flooded with information that it is normal you cannot digest all during lecture.

Prof. Chow always does preparation before lecture so his content is coherent. He also does revision before he starts new content. However, he does not stick to the notes' order to deliver the content all the time so you may feel confused during lecture.

Recordings are provided. Revision would help a lot.
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading Scheme
HW*7 (one of them needs not to be submitted): 15%
Lab report*5: 15%
Midterm: 30%
Final exam: 40%

HW: ~15%

Lab report: ~12%

Midterm: 84/100
-Mean: 57.05
-Median: 59
-UQ: 71
-LQ: 44.63
-High: 93
-Low: 0

Final exam: UNKNOWN

Final grade: A+
reviews.comment_workload:
HW is relatively easy and sometime hints (even answers) are given. There won't be a lot of questions in one HW. 10 days given.

Lab report is the major workload of this course. Result processing is the most time-consuming part, make sure to allocate more people to handle this part, especially lab 5. Minor deductions from TAs are inevitable. 2 weeks given.

Midterm and final exam:
Past paper is provided. Exam questions will be similar to the past paper. Understand the concepts and practise more then you will be fine.

reviews.author: ljdjlalb
reviews.title: Review on 3730
reviews.comment_content:
As of the above

Contents are straight foward. Goes through the lecture videos and read along the notes, you will understand most of the content.
reviews.comment_teaching: Up to standard. Well, I would say the notes are well-prepared, rich in content. And, they are additional reading attached(not be examined). Those reading are useful for you to gain more knwledge, good for your interview.
reviews.comment_grading:
For HW and lab report, as long as you do it reasonablely and with good sense, you will get good marks.
But, I cant coment on the grading on letter grade as final exam scores are not released.
For mid term, mean is 57.05, sd is 14.
As long as you do the past paper, hw and extra exercise provided carefully, and make your own error book, you will get good grade.

I got A with a minimium effort so try to input time on 3730!
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is moderate (as attendance is not required and RVC is provide) and it comes from the lab report. Try to do good division of labour and you will get along with it. For the first 4 lab, workload is ok and you are able to do alone. However, for the last one, it is of very most difficult. The major problem comes to data processing. The data (ard 500 cells) are not given in excel format. Very annoy to input them one by one.

If you have sufficient knowledge about excel, it will be easy to complete.
